lecturers.name: Justin Wong
lecturers.title: iOS Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hello World! I'm a third year EECS & HUGEEE üçé Fanboy. I love to build iOS apps, delve into geopolitics, and get caffeinated on ‚òïÔ∏è in my free time. Feel free to contact me, and let's geek out together!

lecturers.name: Oliver Carmont
lecturers.title: Web Lecturer
lecturers.description: Heyo! I'm Oliver, I'm a senior CS major. From Spain, share a love for travelling, and duh web dev üñ•Ô∏è Reach me at oliver@cubstart.com

lecturers.name: Kat Cheng
lecturers.title: Web Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hiiii!! I'm Kat, a third-year majoring in EECS! When I'm not trying to catch up on sleep, I like to dance, play all the NYT Games (see if you can beat me in the Mini), and design things. I'm trying to be more outdoorsy, so if you have any hiking/scenic recs let me know!

lecturers.name: Jessica Ng
lecturers.title: Web Lead
lecturers.description: Hi, I'm Jessica, a third-year CS major! You can usually find me reading, crocheting, or going on outdoorsy adventures. I'm super excited to meet everyone :)

lecturers.name: Sam Poder
lecturers.title: Web Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hey there! I'm Sam, a second-year CS / Linguistics major. I enjoying making things and going on random public transit adventures. Going to be a fun year!

tas.name: Kaashvi Agnihotri
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi, I'm Kaashvi! I'm a 4th year CS Major, also pursuing DS and English Minors. You can find me drawing, playing video games, or overanalyzing mystery shows :sparkling_heart: Looking forward to meeting everybody!

tas.name: Matthew Gerardi
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi there! My name is Matthew and I'm a third year studying EECS. I love to play beach/indoor volleyball, pickleball, as well as electric guitar. Excited to meet you all and feel free to reach out to chat!

tas.name: Oindree Chatterjee
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Heyyy! I'm Oindree, a second-year EECS major. Aside from my love for web dev, I enjoy hiking, photography, and watching sunsets by the ocean üåÖ I'm excited to meet you all, so please reach out if you have questions or want to chat!

tas.name: Ahmed Hugais
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hi there! I'm Ahmed, a junior studying Computer Science from Yemen. I'm excited to embark on this journey with you as we dive into the fundamentals of web development. Outside of class, I enjoy working out, cooking, and going for walks. Feel free to reach out anytime about anything‚ÄîI'd be happy to chat!

tas.name: Dylan Chhum
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi, I'm Dylan! I am a 4th year EECS major. I love fishing and food. After every midterm or final you can find me at wingstop. Look forward to seeing everyone!

tas.name: Isha Tailor
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi guys! I'm Isha, a second-year from the Bay Area. I like reading, trying new food and coffee places, and practicing taekwondo in my free time. Feel free to contact me with anything!

tas.name: Amber Wang
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hey y'all! I'm Amber, a second-year CS student from LA. I like playing video games and getting free food. Down to grab a smoothie or smth if you want to talk :)))
